Pemprov Babel Gerebek Pelanggar Pidana Tanpa Polisi, Kenapa?
03 Nov 2019, 14:55 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


Pemprov Babel Gerebek Pelanggar Pidana Tanpa Polisi, Kenapa?

KBRN, Jakarta : Baru kali ini, sebuah operasi penertiban perilaku ilegal yang melanggar hukum pidana dilakukan tanpa polisi.Â Pemerintah Provinsi (Pemprov) Bangka Belitung (Babel) hanya menurunkan Satuan Polisi Pamong Praja (Satpol PP) tanpa melibatkan aparat penegak hukum. dalam penertiban tambang timah ilegal yang berujung ricuh di Kabupaten Beliung, Babel, Sabtu, 2 November 2019 kemarin.Operasi yang dipimpin langsung Wakil Gubernur Babel Abdul Fatah hanya membawa Satpol PP tanpa melibatkan Polres Belitung dan Kodim 0414. Padahal, secara teritorial penegakan hukum, daerah tersebut menjadi ranah Polres Belitung, dan secara kewilayahan menjadi tanggung jawab Kodim 0414."Seolah kami tidak bisa dipercaya," ungkap Kapolres Belitung AKBP Yudhis Wibisana kepada wartawan, seperti dilansir detikcom, Minggu (3/11/2019).Padahal menurutnya, Polres Belitung sudah sering melakukan operasi gabungan dengan Kodim 0414 dan Satpol PP Belitung serta muspika setempat. Termasuk kawasan Daerah Aliran Sungai (DAS) Sengkelik, Desa Sijuk, Kecamatan Sijuk, Kabupaten Belitung, tempat razia Wagub dan Satpol PP yang tidak melibatkan aparat penegak hukum kemarin itu."Sudah sering dilakukan razia bersama Polsek dan Koramil serta kecamatan," imbuhnya.Saat disinggung soal alasan Wagub Babel Abdul Fatah dan Satpol PP tidak mengikutsertakan aparat penegak hukum Polres Belitung dan penjaga wilayah Kodim 0414, Kapolres tak mengetahuinya juga secara detil, hanya mendengar kabar bahwa kalau diberitahukan polisi takut rencana operasi bisa bocor."Katanya takut bocor, padahal sudah sering melakukan penertiban tambang timah ilegal," tegasnya.Saat terjadi keributan berujung anarkis, akhirnya Wagub dan Kepala Satpol PP melaporkan kejadian tersebut kepada Polres Belitung, yang langsung direspon dengan menangkap serta memeriksa sejumlah orang terkait bentrok penertiban tambang timah ilegal di aliran Sungai Sengkelik, Desa Sijuk Kecamatan Sijuk, Kabupaten Belitung.Bukan hanya para penambang ilegal yang diperiksa polisi, akan tetapi ada pula dari unsur Satpol PP."Ada 10 orang sementara ini diperiksa Satreskrim Polres. Lima dari masyarakat, lima Satpol PP," pungkas Yudhis.Sebelumnya, aksi penertiban tanpa aparat penegak hukum ini viral di WhatsApp Group (WAG) sampai media sosial, akibat kericuhan yang terjadi. Mobil dinas Wagub Babel dirusak massa, dan Satpol PP sampai dikejar dan tercerai-berai lari tunggang langgang ke dalam hutan oleh para penambang ilegal.

Babel Provincial Raids Criminal Offenders Without Police, Why?
03 Nov 2019, 14:55 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


Babel Provincial Raids Criminal Offenders Without Police, Why?

KBRN, Jakarta: Only this time, an operation to curb illegal behavior that violates criminal law is carried out without the police. The Provincial Government (Pemprov) of Bangka Belitung (Babel) only lowered the Civil Service Police Unit (Satpol PP) without involving law enforcement officers. in controlling illegal tin mines that led to chaos in Beliung Regency, Babel, Saturday, November 2, 2019 yesterday. Operations led directly by Babel Deputy Governor Abdul Fatah only brought Satpol PP without involving Belitung Police and Kodim 0414. In fact, territorially law enforcement, the area Belitung Police Region is the domain of Belitung, and regionally it is the responsibility of Kodim 0414. "As if we cannot be trusted," said Belitung Police Chief AKBP Yudhis Wibisana told reporters, as reported by AFP on Sunday (11/03/2019). According to him, Belitung Police has often carried out joint operations with Kodim 0414 and Satpol PP Belitung and the local muspika. Including the Sakitik River Basin, Sijuk Village, Sijuk Subdistrict, Belitung Regency, where the Deputy Governor and Satpol PP raids did not involve law enforcement officers yesterday. "There have been frequent raids with police and Koramil and sub-districts," he added. touched on the reason for the Deputy Governor of Babel Abdul Fatah and the Satpol PP not to include law enforcement officers in the Belitung District Police and regional police officers of Kodim 0414, the police chief did not know it in detail either, only heard the news that if informed by the police were afraid the operation plan could leak. " often controlling illegal tin mines, "he stressed. When there was an uproar that led to anarchism, the Deputy Governor and Head of the Satpol PP reported the incident to the Belitung Regional Police, who immediately responded by arresting and checking a number of people related to the clashes in controlling illegal tin mines in the Sakitik River, Desa Sijuk Sijuk District, Belitung Regency. Not only illegal miners who are questioned by the police, but there are also elements from the Satpol PP. "There are 10 people who are currently being questioned by the Satreskrim Polres. Five of the community, five Satpol PP, "added Yudhis. Previously, the policing action without law enforcement officers was viral on WhatsApp Group (WAG) to social media, due to the riots that occurred. The Deputy Governor of Babel's office was damaged by the masses, and the Satpol PP was chased and scattered running helter-skelter into the forest by illegal miners.
